| HistoryText             = The Future Avengers are a group of young heroes that were raised by [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] to fight the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]]. | Trivia                  = * The Future Avengers are based off of the main characters of the Marvel/MADHOUSE anime production ''Marvel Future Avengers''. The series premiered on the Disney+ streaming service on February 28th, 2020, two months after their comic appearance.
